Articles.Content:
This here is the most common fighter that served the Kilrathi Empire in the first "Wing Commander" game.  It was also flown by Christopher Blair during the Firekka campaign.

Be careful when you fly this thing when taking off... it pitches up rather quickly due its wing design.  The center of lift was a bit far forward so the RCS tanks were placed in front to move the center of mass forward a bit.

 

Craft file: http://kerbalx.com/pheeph/Dralthi-II.craft

It looks great!

 

I have never played that game, nor do I know the reference, but it looks really cool to me!
